items.label: How to Add Digest to In-App Notifications
How to Add Digest to Email Notifications

channels/chat/discord.title: Discord
channels/chat/discord.description: When using Discord, you will have to save the integration credentials on the subscriber entity. Discord supports two ways to do this:

channels/chat/index.title: Chat Channel
channels/chat/index.description: You can send chat messages on popular chat integrations like Discord and Slack.

channels/chat/msteams.title: MS Teams
channels/chat/msteams.description: MS Teams does not need any API Key or client ID to push messages in it. All it needs is the webhook url

channels/chat/slack.title: Slack
channels/chat/slack.description: When using Slack you will have to save the integration credentials on the subscriber entity.

channels/email/custom-smtp.title: Custom SMTP
channels/email/custom-smtp.description: You can use the Custom SMTP provider like Nodemailer to send transactional emails through your custom SMTP server to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API.

channels/email/index.title: Email
channels/email/index.description: Novu can be used to deliver email messages to your customers using a unified delivery API. You can easily integrate your favorite delivery provider using the built-in integration store.

channels/email/infobip.title: Infobip
channels/email/infobip.description: You can use the Infobip provider to send transactional emails to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/email/mailersend.title: MailerSend
channels/email/mailersend.description: MailerSend is an email delivery service that allows you to send emails from your application.

channels/email/mailgun.title: Mailgun
channels/email/mailgun.description: You can use the Mailgun provider to send transactional emails to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/email/mailjet.title: Mailjet
channels/email/mailjet.description: You can use the Mailjet provider to send transactional emails to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API.

channels/email/mandrill.title: Mandrill
channels/email/mandrill.description: You can use the Mandrill by Mailchimp provider to send transactional emails to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API.

channels/email/netcore.title: Netcore
channels/email/netcore.description: You can use the Netcore provider to send transactional emails to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/email/outlook365.title: Outlook365 ( based in custom SMTP server)
channels/email/outlook365.description: You can use the Outlook 365 provider to send transactional emails through your instance of Office 365 to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API.

channels/email/plunk.title: Plunk
channels/email/plunk.description: You can use the Plunk provider to send transactional emails to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/email/postmark.title: Postmark
channels/email/postmark.description: It is possible to use Postmark as a provider to send transactional emails to the customers using the Novu Platform with a single API.

channels/email/resend.title: Resend
channels/email/resend.description: You can use the Resend provider to send transactional emails to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/email/sendgrid.title: SendGrid
channels/email/sendgrid.description: You can use the SendGrid provider to send transactional emails to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/email/sendinblue.title: Sendinblue
channels/email/sendinblue.description: You can use the Sendinblue provider to send transactional emails to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API.

channels/email/ses.title: Amazon SES
channels/email/ses.description: You can use the Amazon SES provider to send transactional emails to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/email/sparkpost.title: SparkPost
channels/email/sparkpost.description: You can use the SparkPost provider to send transactional emails to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API.

channels/notification-center.title: Notification Center
channels/notification-center.description: This document is still under construction

channels/push/apns.title: Apple Push Notification Service
channels/push/apns.description: Apple Push Notification Service is a notification delivery service provided by Apple.

channels/push/expo.title: Expo Push
channels/push/expo.description: Expo Push is a notification delivery service provided by Expo.

channels/push/fcm.title: Firebase Cloud Messaging
channels/push/fcm.description: Firebase Cloud Messaging is a free notification delivery service provided by Google Firebase.

channels/push/index.title: Push Notifications
channels/push/index.description: Novu can be used to deliver push notifications to your customers devices using a unified delivery API. Both Mobile and Web push notifications are supported.

channels/push/one-signal.title: One Signal
channels/push/one-signal.description: OneSignal is a paid push notification service that supports sending messages via both Apple Push Notification Service (APNs) as well as Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM).

channels/sms/africas-talking.title: Africa's Talking
channels/sms/africas-talking.description: You can use Africa's Talking provider to send SMS messages to your customers using the Novu platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/sms/index.title: SMS
channels/sms/index.description: Novu can be used to send SMS to your customers using a unified delivery API. You can easily integrate your favorite delivery provider using the built-in integration store.

channels/sms/infobip.title: Infobip
channels/sms/infobip.description: You can use the Infobip provider to send SMS messages to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/sms/nexmo.title: Nexmo
channels/sms/nexmo.description: You can use the Nexmo By Vonage provider to send SMS messages to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/sms/plivo.title: Plivo
channels/sms/plivo.description: You can use the Plivo provider to send SMS messages to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/sms/sendchamp.title: Sendchamp
channels/sms/sendchamp.description: You can use the Sendchamp provider to send SMS messages to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/sms/SMS77.title: SMS77
channels/sms/SMS77.description: It is possible to use the SMS77 provider to send SMS messages to the customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/sms/sns.title: AWS SNS
channels/sms/sns.description: You can use the AWS SNS provider to send transactional emails to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/sms/telnyx.title: Telnyx
channels/sms/telnyx.description: You can use the Telnyx provider to send transactional emails to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/sms/termii.title: Termii
channels/sms/termii.description: You can use the Termii provider to send SMS messages to your customers using the Novu Platform with a single API to create multi-channel experiences.

channels/sms/twilio.title: Twilio SMS
channels/sms/twilio.description: You can utilize the Twilio API to communicate in all sorts of ways with your customers. Mainly though, using SMS messaging will you get the best value.

community/create-provider.title: How to add a new provider?
community/create-provider.description: Novu currently supports five channels inapp, push, email, chat and sms. For inapp we support only our own provider, so new providers cannot be added for this channel. For the other four channels we support integration of external providers. This guide will help in adding new providers for any of these 4 channels. In this guide, we are adding a new provider for email channel, but all of the mentioned steps are similar for other channels as well.

community/faq.title: FAQ
community/faq.description: Here we will outline some of the most common questions we get asked about the project. Missing a question? Feel free to open an issue or PR to add it to the list.

community/monorepo-structure.title: Monorepo structure
community/monorepo-structure.description: In this guide, we will explore the Novu mono-repo structure and high-level structure of the different libraries and services we use.

community/projects-and-articles.title: Projects and articles
community/projects-and-articles.description: Here we will showcase some of the projects and articles our community have done with or about Novu.

cookbook/introduction.title: Cookbook
cookbook/introduction.description: This cookbook contains recipes and code samples demonstrating how to accomplish everyday tasks with Novu in your application. Each code example uses our libraries and SDKs.

guides/how-to-add-digest-to-email-notifi.title: How to Add Digest to Email Notifications

guides/how-to-add-digest-to-in-app-notif.title: How to Add Digest to In-App Notifications

home.title: Home
home.description: Explore our guides and examples to integrate Novu.

notification-center/angular-component.title: Angular Component
notification-center/angular-component.description: The @novu/notification-center-angular package provides an Angular component wrapper over the Notification Center Web Component that you can use to integrate the notification center into your Angular application.

notification-center/custom-styling.title: Custom styling
notification-center/custom-styling.description: The Notification Center Component allows you to customize the look of the component. You can do that by using the styles property, but depending on the wrapper UI library we support, the styles prop will be applied to different components, check the examples. The styles object interface and all the props can be found here.

notification-center/FAQ.title: FAQs
notification-center/FAQ.description: Possible causes for the notification center not loading properly:

notification-center/getting-started.title: Getting Started
notification-center/getting-started.description: Novu provides you with a set of APIs and components to create rich customized notification center experiences. You can either choose to work headless with our notification feed API and create your own custom notification center user interface, or use our ready-to-use UI and customize it partially.

notification-center/headless/api-referen.title: Headless Notification Center API Reference
notification-center/headless/api-referen.description: This page contains the complete documentation about the Headless Notification Center package. You can find here the list of all the methods that you can use.

notification-center/headless/headless-se.title: Headless Notification Center
notification-center/headless/headless-se.description: The headless version of Novu's notification library package provides users with a lightweight solution for integrating notification functionality into their web applications. With just the essential API methods, users can easily incorporate our notification system into any framework or vanilla JavaScript project, without being constrained by our default UI or dependencies.

notification-center/iframe-embed.title: iFrame Embed
notification-center/iframe-embed.description: If you are using a (currently) unsupported client framework, you can use our embedded script. This will generate the notification center inside an iframe.

notification-center/react/api-reference.title: React Notification Center API Reference
notification-center/react/api-reference.description: This page contains the complete documentation about the React Notification Center package. You can find here the list of all the components, hooks and props that you can use.

notification-center/react/react-componen.title: React Component
notification-center/react/react-componen.description: Novu provides the @novu/notification-center a React library that helps to add a fully functioning notification center to your web application in minutes. Let's do a quick recap on how we can easily use it in your application.

notification-center/vue-component.title: Vue Component
notification-center/vue-component.description: The @novu/notification-center-vue package provides a Vue component wrapper over the Notification Center Web Component that you can use to integrate the notification center into your Vue application.

notification-center/web-component.title: Web Component
notification-center/web-component.description: The Notification Center Web Component is a custom element that can be used in any web application. It is built by wrapping the React components and consists from its core the three pieces: NovuProvider, PopoverNotificationCenter, and NotificationBell combined together into one.

overview/architecture.title: Architecture
overview/architecture.description: OCL was built around the idea of separation of concerns (SoC). The idea is that transactional communication is composed of many different parts, each of which is responsible for a specific task. Modeling the communication layer is the key for easy maintenance and integration of new functionality.

overview/docker-deploy.title: Deploy using Docker
overview/docker-deploy.description: Docker compose is the easiest way to get started with self-hosted Novu.

overview/introduction.title: Introduction
overview/introduction.description: Novu is an open-source notification infrastructure, built for engineering teams to help them build rich product notification experiences without constantly reinventing the wheel.

overview/quickstart/general-quickstart.title: General Quickstart
overview/quickstart/general-quickstart.description: To create your free managed, or docker-based Novu environment use our CLI tool:

overview/quickstart/get-started-with-ang.title: Angular Quickstart
overview/quickstart/get-started-with-ang.description: Learn how to use Novu to quickly send multi-channel (SMS, Email, Chat, Push) notifications and integrate a rich, customizable and ready-to-use real-time UI In-App notification center in Angular apps.

overview/quickstart/get-started-with-dot.title: .NET Quickstart
overview/quickstart/get-started-with-dot.description: Learn how to use Novu to quickly send multi-channel (SMS, Email, Chat, Push) notifications from a .NET app.

overview/quickstart/get-started-with-kot.title: Kotlin Quickstart
overview/quickstart/get-started-with-kot.description: Learn how to integrate Novu into your Kotlin project on the fly and send notifications across different channels (SMS, Email, Chat, Push).

overview/quickstart/get-started-with-nex.title: NextJS Quickstart
overview/quickstart/get-started-with-nex.description: This quick start guide is written to help you integrate Novu into your NextJS app in no time. Novu is an open-source notifications infrastructure that you can use in your app to deliver rich notifications across channels like sms, email, in-app, push, chat, etc. In this guide, you’ll learn how to integrate email notifications into your NextJS app.

overview/quickstart/get-started-with-nod.title: Node.js Quickstart
overview/quickstart/get-started-with-nod.description: Welcome to the Node.js Quickstart guide for Novu, a powerful notification service that enables you to send multi-channel (SMS, Email, Chat, Push) notifications from your Node.js applications. In this Quickstart, you'll learn how to seamlessly integrate Novu into your app and perform various essential tasks. Let's get started!

overview/quickstart/get-started-with-php.title: PHP Quickstart
overview/quickstart/get-started-with-php.description: Learn how to use Novu to quickly send multi-channel (SMS, Email, Chat, Push) notifications from a PHP app.

overview/quickstart/get-started-with-rea.title: React Quickstart
overview/quickstart/get-started-with-rea.description: Send notifications across different channels (SMS, Email, Chat, Push) and enable real-time In-App notifications with the help of a rich and customizable Notification Center.

overview/quickstart/get-started-with-rub.title: Ruby Quickstart
overview/quickstart/get-started-with-rub.description: Learn how to use Novu to quickly send multi-channel (SMS, Email, Chat, Push) notifications from a Ruby app.

overview/quickstart/get-started-with-van.title: Vanilla JS Quickstart
overview/quickstart/get-started-with-van.description: Learn how to integrate Novu into your vanilla JS app on the fly. Send notifications across different channels (SMS, Email, Chat, Push) and enable real-time In-App notifications with the help of a rich and customizable Notification Center.

overview/quickstart/get-started-with-vue.title: Vue Quickstart
overview/quickstart/get-started-with-vue.description: Learn how to use Novu to quickly send multi-channel (SMS, Email, Chat, Push) notifications and integrate a rich, customizable and ready-to-use realtime UI In-App notification center in Vue apps.

platform/activity-feed.title: Activity Feed
platform/activity-feed.description: Novu provides a notification activity feed that monitors every outgoing message associated with its relevant metadata.

platform/delay.title: Delay Actions
platform/delay.description: The delay action awaits a specified amount of time before moving on to trigger the following steps of the workflow.

platform/digest.title: Digest Engine
platform/digest.description: The digest engine collects multiple trigger events, aggregates them into a single message and delivers it to the subscriber.

platform/environments.title: Environments
platform/environments.description: Novu runs all your requests in the context of an environment. By default, Novu creates two environments when your account was just created, development and production.

platform/inbound-parse-webhook.title: Inbound Parse Webhook
platform/inbound-parse-webhook.description: Inbound Webhook is a feature that allows processing of incoming emails for a domain or subdomain.

platform/integrations.title: Integrations Store
platform/integrations.description: Novu's integrations page is used to configure the final delivery providers for each channel. Novu is an open-source project that allows you to submit a new provider entry whenever you miss a particular provider. You can read more about it here.

platform/layouts.title: Layouts
platform/layouts.description: Novu allows the creation of layouts - a specific HTML design or structure to wrap content of email notifications.

platform/messages.title: Messages
platform/messages.description: Each workflow has one or more than one step. Each step is either a channel (inapp, email, push, chat) or an action (digest, delay). Within the workflow, every channel has a separate template. Email channel step content can be different than inapp channel step content. When a workflow is triggered, Novu generates separate messages for every channel step and sends that message to the recipient. A triggered event (notification) is a collection of step information, its message, and job execution details.

platform/preferences.title: Subscriber Preferences
platform/preferences.description: Novu provides a way to store user preferences in the subscribers data model.

platform/step-filter.title: Step Filter
platform/step-filter.description: Workflow step filtering allows you to customize the flow of notifications in your

platform/subscribers.title: Subscribers
platform/subscribers.description: Subscriber is a user to whom Novu will send a notification. Each subscriber in Novu is uniquely identified by subscriberId. Novu manages your users in the form of subscribers. Novu stores some user-specific information that helps you send multichannel notifications to your users.

platform/topics.title: Topics
platform/topics.description: Novu offers a simple API providing an easy interface for triggering notifications to multiple subscribers at once. It is called Topics and allows the users to manage their bulk notifications without having to do complex loop implementations.

platform/webhooks.title: Webhooks
platform/webhooks.description: Novu provides an URL that you can use to setup webhook support for your integrated provider.

platform/workflows.title: Workflows
platform/workflows.description: A workflow holds the entire flow of messages sent to the subscriber. This is where all the different channels are tied together under a single entity.
